DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the clinical efficacy and safety of SK-0403 in patients with Type2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Dose-Finding Study of SK-0403 With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Treatmentnaive subjects diagnosed with type 2 diabetes mellitus Stable diet program for at least 8 weeks Criteria for HbA1c are met Type 1 diabetes Patients treated with other antidiabetic drugs or Insulin
